price: Ɔno na ͻsoro ne asaase so Kεseyε wͻ no, Ɔne Otumfoͻ a Otumi ade nyinaa yε, Ɔne Onyansafoͻ no.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡكِبۡرِيَآءُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walahu al-kib'riyāu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
